comments: Herro (MIA) briefly wraps his left arm over the left arm of Okongwu (ATL), who is able to free his arm from the marginal contact and get to the ball.
Herro (MIA) backs into the lower body of Okongwu (ATL) and the former's right arm makes additional contact across Okongwu's legs that affects the shot attempt in the paint.
Tucker (MIA) establishes himself in a legal screening position in the path of Huerter (ATL) and his arms come out slightly as he braces for contact on the screen.
Wright (ATL) establishes himself in a legal screening position in the path of Tucker (MIA) and some contact occurs as the latter fights over the pick.
Strus (MIA) turns his body to get parallel to Young's (ATL) path, however, he delivers contact with his shoulder to Young's side and affects his SQBR.
Adebayo (MIA) establishes himself in a legal screening position in the path of Young (ATL) and some contact occurs as the players come together and then disengage.
Okongwu (ATL) brings his left arm around the shoulder of Adebayo (MIA) and pulls him away from the ball during the rebounding opportunity.
Bogdanovic (ATL) is in the paint for longer than three seconds without imminently actively guarding an opponent.
Adebayo (MIA) establishes himself in a screening position in the path of Okongwu (ATL) and his arms come out slightly and make marginal contact with the sides of Okongwu.
Tucker (MIA) legally boxes-out Wright (ATL) to secure the rebound.

Tucker (MIA) establishes himself in a screening position in the path of Bogdanovic (ATL) and he extends and retracts his arms from Bogdanovic as he releases away after setting the pick. The contact on the play is marginal.
Huerter (ATL) is in the paint for longer than three seconds without imminently actively guarding an opponent.
Bogdanovic's (ATL) arm momentarily comes across the front of Butler (MIA) and the offensive player is able to move through the marginal contact.
Wright (ATL) follows the shot and comes into the paint and makes marginal contact with the body of Butler (MIA), who had just returned to floor from his contest of the floater.
Adebayo (MIA) establishes himself in a legal screening position in the path of Hunter (ATL) and marginal contact occurs as the players disengage.
Hunter (ATL) maintains a legal guarding position while defending Butler's (MIA) jump shot attempt.
